title: Issue verifiable credentials in seconds
subtitle: Save time. Go digital.
description: GATACA Certify is a Digital ID credentials issuance tool to create, validate, and digitally sign identity credentials according to W3C standards for global interoperability.

bullets.title: CREATE
bullets.description: Create Verifiable Credential Schemas in public or private catalogues.

bullets.title: MULTI-TENANT
bullets.description: Granular product parametrization to adapt to your processes, organization structure and needs.

bullets.title: ADMINISTRATION PANEL
bullets.description: Configuration and management and track of credentials.

bullets.title: MULTI-LEDGER
bullets.description: So that you may register your DIDs and Credential Schemas in the blockchain of your choice.

bullets.title: GOVERNMENT GRADE SECURITY
bullets.description: Cryptography and blockchain technology provide advanced security for the issuing authority.

bulletOne.title: 1. Create credential schema
bulletOne.description: Build the structure of the credential and which data need to be issued

bulletTwo.title: 2. Issue Credential
bulletTwo.description: The credential is issued and the end-user notified.

bullets.title: Identity fraud reduction
bullets.description: By accepting previously verified credentials, entities guarantee the information received is trustworthy & accurate.

bullets.title: Privacy protection
bullets.description: We provide users with control over their personal information, so they feel comfortable using your services..

bullets.title: Digital transformation
bullets.description: Our technology enables accessible & sustainable digital transformation and creates seamless digital experiences for your clients..

bullets.title: New revenue streams
bullets.description: Diversify your revenue streams through credential issuance models.
